ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] UseFUL songs...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s usually a good idea to remember to stack this one - as you will be less likely to forget that you have it running, and bump into a guard... Talies the
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:39 PM 2/28/2001 -0500, you wrote:
>Lvl 2: CHords of discord:
>Area of effect DOT song. Greatly enhanced by using a stringed instrument.
>You will actually find this song more useful once you get to lvl 18 and want
>to do an all instruement attack with this, Hymm and the lvl 18 AOE DOT. It
>damages scale well, and eventually it comes close to the damage of the
>higher lvl DOT songs.

It's usually a good idea to remember to stack this one - as you will be
less likely to forget that you have it running, and bump into a guard...

Talies the often-killed-by-guards
